item.description:
First, THANKS everybody who braved one of the chilliest, windiest nights
to join us at our March meetup. Your heartfelt presence and enthusiastic
participation warmed us right away!

THANKS much again to Diane D'Souza and Leah Shapiro
( http://www.law-of-att... ) for leading us
in wonderful discussions and activities.

Wow, it's great that we'll be seeing a lot of you next week who've
enthusiastically being there for each other from the beginning of our
Boston LOA meetup. Was it only 3 months ago that we first met?

We're doubly blessed that you're sharing our meetup with others
and bringing them along too.

and YES, a BIG WELCOME to our new members. We look forward to
supporting you in your LOA journey as we appreciate your support for us too.

========
AGENDA for our APRIL meetup next Tuesday, April 3rd, 7 pm.

(1) Dave Buck will unveil our first "virtual" study group & topic.
Folks who's at meetup will have first dips to sign up.

(2) We are delighted to have a special guest, Rob Kanzer.

Topic: Ask, Believe, Receive: Find Your Voice Inside and Out to
Deliberately Create What You Want

Whether you suffer from unclear vision and frustration or
you simply want to be more powerful in deliberately manifest your desires...
Life and Business Coach Rob Kanzer can help.

Your ability to connect and engage your inner power
starts with your own passion and beliefs. Come with the
desires you want to deliberately create and be willing to try
really fun ways to give voice to your desires simply yet
powerfully.

Be ready to receive ... don't be surprised to get what you
want this evening! :-)

Our time together is always one of engagement... inspiring and safe,
to have you learn, feel and give voice to your desires.
Be willing to ask, share with each other and receive.


Rob Kanzer, President of The Cambridge Coaching Collaborative,
since 1981 continues to provide powerful, life changing
improvements for companies and individuals that seek true
personal and professional transformation.

A successful entrepreneur in his own right, Rob is a Crisis Intervention
Counselor, certified mediator and Master Presenter.
He combines traditional and his own "true life curriculum" that
you can adapt to your own needs.

You're welcomed to contact Rob directly for some free coaching
prior to our meetup.

RobKanzer@RobKanzer.com
(617) 491-8939
http://www.RobKanzer....

Seating is limited, so please remember to RSVP Today!

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: April MeetUp
